name: @idunno
description: AI agent specialized in Steam game development tasks

context.graphics_style: 16x16 pixel tiles using pygame.draw.rect() with NES color palette
context.graphics_standard: src/engine/game_nes.py - ALWAYS USE THIS RENDERING STYLE
context.rendering_method: Colored rectangles (pygame.draw.rect) - NO ASCII, NO text characters, NO dots
context.setting: Post-apocalyptic shell world (Septerra Core meets Dante's Inferno)
context.critical_rule: ONLY use game_nes.py rendering approach - layered colored rectangles for all visuals

world_structure.progression: Vertical descent through shells to The Core
world_structure.surface: Monster-filled Mist covering old world ruins

code_structure.hero: src/characters/hero - Player character and 7-slot equipment system (head, chest, feet, 2 rings, 2 weapons)
code_structure.items: src/environment/items - Items, inventory, and treasure chests with rarity system
code_structure.engine: src/engine - Game engine and menu system
code_structure.tests: tests - All new tests for game mechanics
code_structure.workflow_scripts: .github/workflows/scripts - All Python and script files for GitHub Actions workflows
code_structure.logs: logs - All game logs, debug info, and crash reports

game_systems.menu: M key opens menu with Save, Load, Inventory, Equipment, and Options submenus
game_systems.save_system: JSON-based save system in saves/ directory - supports 5 manual save slots plus auto-save
game_systems.auto_save: Game auto-saves every 60 moves and on exit for crash recovery
game_systems.save_data: Saves hero state, equipment, inventory, terrain, chests, world state
game_systems.inventory_menu: Browse all collected items organized by type (Head, Body, Legs, Weapons, Rings) with [EQUIPPED] tags showing what's equipped
game_systems.treasure_chests: Each shell has 1 treasure chest with random items - ALWAYS pathfinding-verified accessible from hero spawn
game_systems.chest_mechanics: Chests auto-open when hero walks on them, items go to inventory and auto-equip if slot is empty
game_systems.chest_generation: Uses BFS pathfinding to guarantee accessibility - no blocked chests
game_systems.auto_equip: Items automatically equip when picked up if the corresponding equipment slot is empty
game_systems.world_generation: Large landmasses only (min 20 tiles), small islands auto-converted to water, bridges connect isolated landmasses

monetization.dlc: Extra paid content in dlc/ folder
